title: Ultimate Rapid Fire?
body: Will we be getting this April 1st? (Varying on when we get our patch)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Shoklimb,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bAQcLbsh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-30T22:28:58.601+0000)
>
> said noone ever

it's what people deserve for making the "bring back urf!!! it was da bestest!!!" threads every fucking day.
nah ur jsut bad at urf!1!!11 its wy u hate ~~the~~*TEH* gaem

It actually seems like an interesting game mode, where strategic choices come thick and fast as you decide whether or not you should use your abilities/combo on someone to kill them, or poke them until you're out of mana. I think that this will heavily affect the meta (which I hate anyway) and also the choices that players make.
